org.jruyi.core

Interface IFileKeyStoreBuilder


  • public interface IFileKeyStoreBuilder
    A builder to build a new ISslContextParameters backed by file-based key/trust stores which are used to initialize an SSL context.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISslContextParameters build()
      Builds and returns a new ISslContextParameters backed by file-based key/trust stores.
      IFileKeyStoreBuilder certValidation(boolean certValidation)
      Sets whether to validate the certificate chain.

      Sets the algorithm of the key manager factory.

      Sets the provider of the key manager factory implementation.

      • build

        ISslContextParameters build()
                     throws java.lang.Throwable
